root.name: Typing Shuugyou: Hokuto no Ken Gekiuchi Zero
root.description: OverviewThis was the third typing games to be released by SSI Tristar that was released in February 2001.StoryThe story takes place just before the Apocalypse starts where Ryuken is training Kenshiro in the art of Hokuto Shinken.GameplayThe game plays like the previous typing games but the levels are more focused towards the training levels from previous games where there are 6 training stages that teaches the player how to touch type and it uses different environments for the training stages.Once the training stages are complete, the 7th one is unlocked where the player will have to fight Shin. Upon completion, it will play out like the manga where Ken will be given the seven scars on his chests.
